original_text: Then I looked up, and there before me was a man with a measuring line in his hand.
korean_text: 내가 또 눈을 들어 본즉 한 사람이 측량줄을 그의 손에 잡았기로

sentences.original_text: and there before me was a man
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 내 앞에 한 사람이 있었다

sentences.original_text: with a measuring line in his hand
